fields.description:
HUGO SANCHEZ

I changed his phone# in QOLO, while running the test he didn’t received the answer for his balance, he received “ we are sorry but can’t recognized this phone# “ I asked if he had another acct linked to his WA account and he said no. Can you please help up with this case?

External Unique Id: oCsfZUYyNpyUG5v_xumMh

cproxy0729494703611

comments.body:
[~accountid:636e6ef3c87c50433009887b] did you walk the cardholder through checking their Whatsapp number or just ask them?

[https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number/|https://www.howtogeek.com/771174/how-to-check-your-whatsapp-number/|smart-link] 

We have *never* received *any* messages from his number on file. When we try to send messages to his number on file we receive the dreaded *Error 63003 cannot find channel*, which most likely means he has a different number connected to Whatsapp than he thinks.


!Screen Shot 2023-05-17 at 9.05.43 AM.png|width=91.66666666666666%!

!Screen Shot 2023-05-17 at 9.05.30 AM.png|width=91.66666666666666%!



h2. [ERROR - 63003|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#error-63003]

h3. [Channel could not find To address|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#channel-could-not-find-to-address]

You have tried to send a message to a To address that is inactive or invalid.

h4. [Possible Causes|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#possible-causes]

* The To address is no invalid or longer belongs to a mobile user
* The To address was entered or formatted incorrectly

h4. [Possible Solutions|https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/errors/63003#possible-solutions]

* Ensure you have provided the correct To address for the user you are trying to reach
* Ensure that the To address is still active

Hi [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08] I’m seeing your screenshots were using a number that was outdated, and had been updated by Dianne. I added the Qolo info here. The correct phone number is *+18632203577*. Can you please confirm that this number is *_also_* not associated with a WhatsApp account?

!Screenshot 2023-05-17 at 10.44.20.png|width=552,height=403!

!Screenshot 2023-05-17 at 10.44.40.png|width=1588,height=121!

[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] his phone number is wrong in his cardholder record in our db then, it’s currently {{+18032203577}}

I do see messages from the user coming from {{+18632203577}} so I’ve updated the cardholder’s phone number in our database.

Please follow-up with the user, I expect this is resolved now.

[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] [~accountid:613e6eaa1238e8007108f513] [~accountid:5b5631f96366b42ca0ded60d] this is an example of where having the cardholder send us a unique number and putting it in the card would have exposed the issue more quickly since I could have looked and seen that the number was incorrect.
Thank you [~accountid:62780ad493111000689ece08] ! Do we know why the phone number wouldn’t have synced with the db?
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620] I do not know why the number wouldn’t have updated in our db, [~accountid:5b5631f96366b42ca0ded60d] any idea?
This was probably changed during a timeframe when Qolo has a bug sending events. Nothing we can do about that.
[~accountid:619f24d9ef18ca00712cc620]  [~accountid:636e6ef3c87c50433009887b]  I’ll go ahead and close this ticket.
